payment.Якщо ви не маєте фінансової освіти і баж: If you lack financial education and the desire to understand how financial markets work, then you should pay attention to the sector that helps invest money. These are investment companies and banks, investment funds, hedge funds, pension funds, consultants and others.
payment.В таких компаніях працюють професіонали,: Professionals who understand finance and investments work in such companies. They raise money from retail investors and companies and invest it to make money for their clients. This activity is licensed and employees must be professional in their activities and put the interests of customers above their own.
payment.Існують компанії, які надають доступ до: There are companies that provide access to trading platforms, and people trade on their own and take all the risks. In the case of institutional investors, their job is to do everything possible to ensure that the client gets the best result according to the degree of risk he is willing to accept.

confirmPayment.Я прочитав і згоден з умовами публічної: I have read and agree to the terms of the public offer
confirmPayment.щодо укладення договору про надання неви: regarding the conclusion of an agreement on the provision of non-exclusive licenses for the use of the construction site control service
confirmPayment.За цією Офертою Товариство з обмеженою в: According to this Offer, the Limited Liability Company «Salerow» (hereinafter - the Licensor) offers an unlimited number of natural persons to enter into an agreement on the provision of non-exclusive licenses for the use of the construction site control service.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіар надає фізичній особі (далі – Л: The Licensor grants a natural person (hereinafter referred to as the Licensee) non-exclusive licenses to use the service of monitoring construction objects, which is posted on the website of the Licensor, where this public offer is posted (hereinafter referred to as the Service).
confirmPayment.Сервіс дає право Ліцензіату контролювати: The service gives the Licensee the right to control the construction process of selected objects, in particular, to receive detailed information about each stage of the construction of the object in his personal account, to familiarize himself with all the project documentation and to communicate directly with the developer of the construction object.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіат може отримати необмежену кільк: The licensee can obtain an unlimited number of licenses.
confirmPayment.УМОВИ ВИКОРИСТАННЯ СЕРВІСУ: TERMS OF USE OF THE SERVICE
confirmPayment.Ліцензіат самостійно реєструється у Серв: The Licensee independently registers in the Service using a unique login and password, which the Licensee creates independently.
confirmPayment.Після реєстрації в Сервісі, Ліцензіат от: After registering in the Service, the Licensee gets access to a personal account, where he has the opportunity to purchase a non-exclusive license for the selected construction object.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіат обирає одну або декілька ліцен: The licensee chooses one or more licenses and pays the fee provided for using the Service.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіат не має права видавати субліцен: The licensee has no right to issue sublicenses for the use of the Service to third parties, and also has no right to transfer his login and access password to his personal account in the Service. In this regard, the Licensee agrees that all actions that will be performed in the Service using the Licensee's login and password are considered actions that the Licensee performed personally.
confirmPayment.Територія дії невиключних прав, які нада: The scope of the non-exclusive rights granted to the Licensee is not limited.
confirmPayment.Строк дії ліцензії встановлюється щодо к: The term of validity of the license is established for each construction object separately and is indicated on the website of the Licensor.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіату надається тестовий період на: The licensee is granted a test period for using the Service, which is 3 months from the day the Licensee makes the corresponding payment.
confirmPayment.Якщо після закінчення тестового періоду: If, after the end of the test period, the Licensee, for any reason, informs the Licensor of its refusal to continue using the Service, then the Licensor undertakes to return to the Licensee the money paid by it for using the Service. At the same time, the Licensor fully returns to the Licensee the amount paid by the Licensee, as well as additional compensation in the amount of 10% of the specified amount. The Licensor is aware that during the payment of additional compensation, the Licensor performs the duties of a tax agent and withholds and pays the necessary taxes to the budget from the amount of additional compensation charged.
confirmPayment.Після повернення коштів Ліцензіату Ліцен: After refunding the Licensee's funds, the Licensor terminates the Licensee's access to the Service.
confirmPayment.Вартість плати за користування Сервісом: The fee for using the Service is indicated on the Licensor's website.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіат сплачує за користування Сервіс: The Licensee pays for the use of the Service by making a 100% advance payment to the Licensor's bank account specified in the details of this Agreement, or using the payment systems available on the Licensor's website.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіар вправі змінювати вартість плат: The Licensor has the right to change the fee for using the Service until the Licensee makes the corresponding payment. The licensor may also set different fees for obtaining a non-exclusive license for different construction sites.
confirmPayment.Вартість плати може бути змінена Ліцензі: The fee may be changed by the Licensor unilaterally without prior notice to the Licensee. In such a case, the changed price becomes effective from the moment it is indicated on the Licensor's website.
confirmPayment.СТРОК ДІЇ ДОГОВОРУ ТА ПОРЯДОК РОЗІРВАННЯ: TERM OF THE AGREEMENT AND PROCEDURE FOR TERMINATION
confirmPayment.Дата реєстрації Ліцензіата у Сервісі вва: The date of registration of the Licensee in the Service is considered the date of conclusion of this Agreement.
confirmPayment.Цей Договір опублікований на веб-сайті Л: This Agreement is published on the Licensor's website and is valid for the duration of the licenses purchased by the Licensee.
confirmPayment.Цей Договір може бути розірваний у випад: This Agreement may be terminated in the event of:
confirmPayment.відмови Ліцензіата від користування Серв: refusal of the Licensee to use the Service after the end of the test period;
confirmPayment.з ініціативи Ліцензіара за умови поперед: at the initiative of the Licensor, provided that the Licensee is notified 30 calendar days before the scheduled date of termination of the Agreement. In the event of termination of the contract at the initiative of the Licensee before the license term, the Licensor shall return the money paid by the Licensee to the Licensee in full.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіар має право вносити зміни до Дог: The Licensor has the right to make changes to the Agreement unilaterally without prior notice to the Licensee. In such a case, the updated version of the Agreement becomes effective from the moment it is published on the Licensor's website.
confirmPayment.У разі незгоди Ліцензіата зі змінами, вн: If the Licensee disagrees with the changes made to the Agreement, such Licensee must stop using the Service. Continued use of the Service indicates the Licensee's agreement with the changes made to the Agreement.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіат вважається ознайомленим з умов: The licensee is considered to have read the terms of the Agreement and to have agreed to them at the time of payment for the use of the Service.
confirmPayment.Умови цього Договору є однаковими та обо: The terms of this Agreement are the same and binding for all natural persons.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіат не має права розголошувати тре: The Licensee does not have the right to disclose to third parties the information about the Licensor that became known in connection with the execution of this Agreement, except for the cases provided for by the legislation of Ukraine.
confirmPayment.Акцептуючи цей Договір, Ліцензіат дає зг: By accepting this Agreement, the Licensee consents to the processing of his personal data and their entry into the Licensor's database in accordance with the requirements of the Law of Ukraine «On the Protection of Personal Data». The licensee confirms that he has been informed of his rights in accordance with the Law of Ukraine «On the Protection of Personal Data».
confirmPayment.Ліцензіар може використовувати персональ: The Licensor may use the Licensee's personal data for the purpose of:
confirmPayment.опрацювання запитів на користування Серв: processing requests for using the Service;
confirmPayment.повернення Ліцензіату грошових коштів у: return of funds to the Licensee in case of termination of this Agreement;
confirmPayment.надання Ліцензіату інформаційної підтрим: provision of information support to the Licensee in case of questions;
confirmPayment.Ліцензіар може залучати своїх підрядникі: The Licensor may engage its contractors/employees to process the Licensee's personal data.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіар може використовувати контактні: The Licensor may use the Licensee's contact information for the purpose of sending informational messages outside the personal account that relate to construction objects or changes in the Service. At the written request of the Licensee, the latter's contact details are excluded from the list of recipients for informational messages.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіар може використовувати файли coo: he licensor may use cookies to study user experience and improve the quality of its services. Deleting or blocking cookies may affect the quality of using the website.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіар застосовує технічні та організ: The Licensor applies technical and organizational measures to protect the information received from the Licensee.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіар має право на доступ до інформа: The licensor has the right to access information about how his personal data is processed and stored.
confirmPayment.Ліцензіар несе відповідальність за шкоду: The Licensor is responsible for damage caused to the Licensee by violation of this section on the protection of personal data.
